title: Heilongjiang Province, China
description: Heilongjiang is a province of China located in the northeastern part of the country. The flat interior part of the province grows soybeans, maize, wheat, beets, flax and sunflowers. Farms are small and long skinny rectangles in shape, surrounding regularly spaced villages.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
